actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, strengthens Jing, tonifies Qi and nourishes the Blood.
Strengthens the Spleen, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, transforms Phlegm, quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Calms the Spirit, sedates the Heart, clears the channel joining the Heart and Kidneys, expels Phlegm and opens the Orifices.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, soothes irritability, nourishes the Blood and calms the Spirit.

symptoms: Convulsions with loss of control of urine and stool
